backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profile management and contact form submission functionality with role-based access control using MixinAuthorization; includes admin-only endpoints for viewing submissions and user-only endpoints for profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, pages, and configuration files for an insurance broker website with admin panel and Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space, including navy, gold, accent-blue, and slate color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with basic meta tags, title for Jonathan Ayan Insurance Broker Website, and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with homepage and admin panel routes, wrapped in QueryClientProvider; homepage includes hero, services, child benefits, companies, contact sections with decorative dividers.
frontend/src/components/ChildBenefitsSec: Section component explaining child life insurance benefits with two feature cards highlighting tax-free wealth building and compounded interest growth, styled with navy gradient background and decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection: Section displaying five A+ rated insurance carrier logos (Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life, Foresters) plus a '+25 other carriers' card, with explanatory text about independent broker advantages.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form component with validation for insurance inquiries, collecting user details (name, state, age, gender, product interest, coverage amount, contact preferences) and submitting via useSubmitContactForm hook. Includes success/error alerts and form state management.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying company information (Equity Insurance Partners, Jonathan Ayan), contact details, services list, copyright notice, caffeine.ai attribution, and admin link. Uses gradient navy background with gold accents.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with Miami skyline background image, featuring Jonathan Ayan's name, title (Life & Annuity Insurance Broker), professional headshot, and call-to-action buttons that scroll to contact section.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component using Internet Identity, handling login/logout with query client cache clearing and error recovery for already-authenticated state.
Services section displaying two cards for Life Insurance and Annuities with icons, descriptions, and feature lists. Uses gradient background with decorative pattern overlay.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instances based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and authentication status states (initializing, idle, logging-in, success, error).
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile management, admin checks, and contact form submission with extensive logging and type mapping between frontend and backend enums.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom insurance-themed color variables (navy, gold, accent-blue, slate) for both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page component that checks authentication and admin status, displays contact form submissions in a table, and handles user profile setup with principal ID copying functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom insurance brand colors (navy, gold, accent-blue, slate) using OKLCH color space and custom shadow/radius utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata indicating an Insurance Broker Portal with a known issue where admin access fails in production after publishing, and pending feature requests to fix Principal ID whitelist configuration and persistence.
